hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Whitespace delimited list of branches to attempt to build. Priority is highest -> lowest from left to right. "master' is implicitly append to the right side of the list.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PRODUCT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Whitespace delimited list of EUPS products to build.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: SKIP_DEMO
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Do not run the demo after all packages have completed building.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: NO_FETCH
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Do not pull from git remote if branch is already the current ref. (This should generally be false outside of testing the CI system)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
ARGS=() ARGS+=('--branch') ARGS+=("$BRANCH") ARGS+=('--build_number') ARGS+=("$BUILD_NUMBER") ARGS+=('--product') ARGS+=("$PRODUCT") ARGS+=('--skip_docs')
if [[ $SKIP_DEMO == "true" ]]; then ARGS+=('--skip_demo') fi
if [[ $NO_FETCH == "true" ]]; then ARGS+=('--no-fetch') fi
sudo -u build${EXECUTOR_NUMBER} LSSTSW=/home/build${EXECUTOR_NUMBER}/lsstsw /home/build${EXECUTOR_NUMBER}/buildbot-scripts/lsstswBuild.sh "${ARGS[@]}"
